body.name: Tangkula 8-Cube Bookcase, Wood 3 Tier Open Storage Bookshelf, Modern Multipurpose Display Cabinet for Living Room, Study, Reading Nook, 48 x 12.5 x 36.5 Inch, Burlywood
features: 📚【Specifications】Overall Dimension: 48” x 12.5” x 36.5” (L x W x H), Dimension of Large Cube: 23” x 12” x 10.5” (L x W x H), Dimension of Small Cube: 15” x 12” x 10.5” (L x W x H), Net Weight: 72.5 lbs, Weight Capacity of Top: 132 lbs, Weight Capacity of Each Cube: 44 lbs. Package Includes: 1 x Bookcase, 1 x User’s Manual

🧸【Spacious Storage Space】The 3-tier bookcase is designed with 8 open shelf compartments that provide plenty of space for classified storage for your books, CDs, magazines, and collections and keep your room organized. It is suitable for the living room, kitchen, or bedroom as a display cabinet, bookcase, storage cabinet, toy cabinet, etc.

📚【Freestanding Open Design】Featuring a simple upright and open design, the 3-tier display bookcase can help eliminate clutter, maximize space, and is convenient for easy fetching. The open design makes item placement clearly visible so you can find items quickly and easily, saving a lot of time.

🧸【Premium Material & Sturdy Construction】Made of selected engineered board, the wood storage cube bookcase is durable, deform-proof for a long lifespan. With non-slip adhesive pads, the storage cabinet ensure great support for stability without damaging the floor. Fixed plastic buckles on the back enhance the additional steadiness.

📚【Delicate Design for Various Uses】Designed with elegant and mysterious white finish and crisscross partitions, the storage cube wooden bookcase can well match the decoration of your home. It can be used as a bookcase, display cabinet, storage shelf, making your home, office, or school more elegant and stylish.

🧸【Easy Assembly & Maintenance】The open shelf bookcase comes with detailed and illustrated instruction in the package. You can quickly install the freestanding bookshelf under the guidance of clear instructions. What’s more, the board surface is smooth and waterproof, so that you can easily clean with a cloth.
body.description: DescriptionOur 3-tier bookcase is composed of 8 cubes of 2 sizes that are spacious for storing your belongings, such as books, clothes, ornaments, kid's toys, etc. Great choice to create a clean and tidy environment for working, writing, or reading! Our 3-tier floor standing display cabinet is made of premium board frame, anti-scratch, and deform-resistant, and very easy to clean. Designed with non-slip adhesive pads and Fixed plastic buckles on the back, the storage cabinet can withstand large capacity for stability and enhance the additional steadiness. The freestanding, upright and open design also provides great convenience for easy fetching and looking up. The storage cube wooden bookcase can be widely used as a bookcase, toy cabinet, and display cabinet to meet your different needs. You can put it in the living room, bedroom, study, office, kids' room, and reading room. Simple and stylish appearance adds some character to your home style!Feature8 cubes compartments of 2 sizes for spacious storage spaceFull open shelves with proper height for easy fetchingWide top with elevated edges provides extra storage spaceSturdy wooden bookcase with reinforced back buckles for stabilitySmooth surface and round corners prevent accident injuriesReinforced Structure to support large weight capacityPerfect for playrooms, living rooms, school classrooms, kindergartensEasy to clean and maintain with waterproof and smooth surfaceSimple and stylish appearance can better match your home decorationSpecificationColor: White/French Oak GreyMaterial: Engineered Wood, MDFOverall Dimension: 48” x 12.5” x 36.5” (L x W x H)Dimension of Large Cube: 23” x 12” x 10.5” (L x W x H)Dimension of Small Cube: 15” x 12” x 10.5” (L x W x H)Net Weight: 72.5 lbsWeight Capacity of Top: 132 lbsWeight Capacity of Each Cube: 44 lbsPackage Includes:1 x Bookcase1 x User’s Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect display shelf
reviews.reviewText: I got this for the living room, for books, photo albums, and decorations. It is the perfect size, seems well made, was very easy to put together, and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Bookcase Storage Solution
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this unit for my office workspace/craft room, and it didn't disappoint! Assembly was straightforward and the unit is sturdy. I can store lots of supplies on the shelves.Make sure you check the dimensions before ordering. If you want to store tall books, for example, they might be too tall. Perfect for my needs, though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So much space
reviews.reviewText: My only gripe with this pertains to the color. The photos don't seem to show it well enough but it's definitely a lot darker of a grey tone than I anticipated. Was sad there was no other reviews of the grey, mostly white shelves people had reviewed. So here is a photo of it and I hope it helps anyone else that may be curious about it. Outside of that, I was initially concerned because the box it came in didn't say the brand name of the company it says you're purchasing it from. However, it's definitely the shelf advertised, not sure what's up with that. As far as everything else, this shelf seems very sturdy and has the capability to SO many books. I had been struggling to find a shelf that would fit all of my kids books and this actually had some room to spare the way that I organized them. Despite my gripes, would purchase another just better to know the color and if it will go with decor you're trying to go for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Little Shelf!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble. I bought it to keep some of my things in at work since my desk doesn’t have drawers. It’s great. 100% recommend using the wall supports because it makes the shelf completely unmovable! Just what I needed! Super sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very practical and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet is very practical. That's where I put the kids' clothes. Toys go there. Kids can get them easily. The quality is also very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars don't waste your time or money
reviews.reviewText: I spent 6 hours putting this thing together for it to look like utter garbage. the side pieces will not stay put on the rest of the item no matter how much force I use to push them together. way too expensive for the extremely mediocre outcome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toy storage
reviews.reviewText: My child cannot wait for this toy ‘s “new room”. This is perfect for toy storage. My child said this is toy’s new room and house. All toys can stay inside and have fun. It is easy to assemble. Save a lot of space for storage. Love it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap quality but "good enough"
reviews.reviewText: This is made from OSB aka chip board. It's pretty much the cheapest kind of wood you can get. Even IKEA furniture is made of better wood. A few of the metal fasteners it came with broke in half because I guess I tightened them too much. All that said, it is holding together ok and it's still functional. You may want to add some additional screws. It does come with white stickers to cover any screw holes.
